name: Email Channel
description: Connect Agent Zero to email via IMAP/SMTP. Polls for incoming emails and replies via SMTP.

imap_port.label: IMAP Port
imap_port.description: IMAP server port (993 for TLS, 143 for plain)

imap_user.label: IMAP Username
imap_user.description: Email address or username for IMAP login

imap_password.label: IMAP Password
imap_password.description: Password or app-specific password for IMAP login

smtp_port.label: SMTP Port
smtp_port.description: SMTP server port (587 for STARTTLS, 465 for SSL)

smtp_user.label: SMTP Username
smtp_user.description: Email address or username for SMTP login (often same as IMAP)

smtp_password.label: SMTP Password
smtp_password.description: Password or app-specific password for SMTP login

use_tls.label: Use TLS
use_tls.description: Use TLS/SSL encryption for both IMAP and SMTP connections

poll_interval.label: Poll Interval (seconds)
poll_interval.description: How often to check for new emails (in seconds)

allowed_senders.label: Allowed Senders
allowed_senders.description: Comma-separated email addresses. Only emails from these senders will be processed. Leave empty for all.
